data.name: Stardust Pack
data.detailed_description: The Stardust Pack contains an assortment of oculis : 2 HP, 2 MP, 2 Strength, 2 Defense, 2 Magic, 2 Magic Defense, 1 Critical, 1 Dodge, 1 Speed
data.about_the_game: The Stardust Pack contains an assortment of oculis : 2 HP, 2 MP, 2 Strength, 2 Defense, 2 Magic, 2 Magic Defense, 1 Critical, 1 Dodge, 1 Speed
data.short_description: The Stardust Pack contains an assortment of oculis : 2 HP, 2 MP, 2 Strength, 2 Defense, 2 Magic, 2 Magic Defense, 1 Critical, 1 Dodge, 1 Speed
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8/8.1 (32/64bit versions)
  • Processor: ntel Core2Duo E8200 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X2 240 @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800 GT or AMD Radeon HD2900 XT (512MB VRAM with Shader Model 4.0 or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse required, optional Microsoft XBOX360 controller or compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8/8.1 (32/64bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q8400 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X4 620 @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX260 or AMD Radeon HD4870 (512MB VRAM with Shader Model 4.0 or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse required, optional Microsoft XBOX360 controller or compatible
